definition: a musical note having the time value of an eighth of a whole note, to sing or play with trills, alternating with the half note above or below
details:
noun
- a musical note having the time value of an eighth of a whole note
= example: a musical note having the time value of an eighth of a whole note
= synonyms: eighth note
- a tremulous sound
= example: a tremulous sound
verb
- to sing or play with trills, alternating with the half note above or below
= example: to sing or play with trills, alternating with the half note above or below
= synonyms: warble
- to give off unsteady sounds, alternating in amplitude or frequency
= example: to give off unsteady sounds, alternating in amplitude or frequency
= synonyms: waver
